sentences.sContent: He made a murderous attack on his wife that evening.
sentences.sCn: 那天晚上他想致妻子于死地。

synos.tran: 杀人的，残忍的；凶残的；蓄意谋杀的

remMethod.val: 来自murder (v. 谋杀， 凶杀)

trans.tranCn: 行凶的， 凶恶的； 非常危险的
trans.tranOther: A murderous attack or other action is very violent and intended to result in someone's death
